Collapsible Picnic Basket: Design a collapsible picnic basket that can be easily folded up and stored away when not in use. This would make it more convenient for transportation and storage.

Solar-Powered Picnic Basket: Develop a solar-powered picnic basket that can harness the power of the sun to keep food at the desired temperature, eliminating the need for batteries or other power sources.

Picnic Basket with Built-in Cooler: Create a picnic basket with a built-in cooler that can be used to keep perishable items cold for a longer period of time. This would be especially useful for outdoor events or picnics in warm weather.

Picnic Basket with Built-in Grill: Design a picnic basket that includes a built-in grill for cooking food on the go. This would be perfect for outdoor enthusiasts who want to enjoy a complete meal in the great outdoors.

Picnic Basket with LED Lighting: Create a picnic basket with built-in LED lighting that can be used to illuminate the area around the picnic site during evening or night-time. This would be especially useful for outdoor events or picnics in low-light conditions.
